00009 int generate_bpmsignal( bpmconf_t *bpm, bpmmode_t *mode, beamconf_t *beam, doublewf_t *rf ) {
00010 
00011   int j,k = 0;
00012   int shift = 0;
00013   static char msg[80];
00014   //doublewf_t *rf_bunch = NULL;
00015 
00016   if ( ! bpm || !mode || ! beam || ! rf ) {
00017     bpm_error( "Invalid pointer arguments in generate_bpmsignal(...)",
00018                __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00019     return BPM_FAILURE;
00020   }
00021 
00022   if ( ! mode->response ) {
00023     bpm_error( "Mode response is not defined in generate_bpmsignal(...)",
00024                __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00025     return BPM_FAILURE;
00026   }
00027 
00028   //printf("Mode response has %i samples\n", mode->response->ns);
00029 
00030   if ( ! mode->buffer ) {
00031     mode->buffer = doublewf( mode->response->ns, mode->response->fs );
00032   }  
00033 
00034   //if ( ! rf_bunch ) {
00035   //  bpm_error( "Can not allocate a temporary array in generate_bpmsignal(...)",
00036   //              __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00037   //  return BPM_FAILURE;
00038   //}
00039 
00040   //printf("Processing %i bunches...\n", beam->nbunches);
00041 
00042   // loop over all bunches
00043   for ( j=0;j<beam->nbunches;j++ ) {
00044 
00045     //printf("Processing bunch %i\n", j);
00046 
00047     doublewf_reset( mode->buffer );
00048 
00049     if ( add_mode_response( bpm, mode, &( beam->bunch[j] ), mode->buffer ) ) {
00050       sprintf( msg, "Cannot add response for mode %s in generate_bpmsignal", 
00051                mode->name );
00052       bpm_error( msg, __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00053       return BPM_FAILURE;
00054     }
00055 
00056     //printf( "Adding signal for bunch %i arriving at dt = %f ns\n", j, beam->bunch[j].arrival_time/_nsec__ );
00057 
00058     // find the first sample of the multibunch waveform
00059     // affected by the current bunch
00060     if ( beam->bunch[j].arrival_time == 0. ) {
00061       shift = 0;
00062     } else {
00063       shift = floor( beam->bunch[j].arrival_time * rf->fs ) + 1;
00064     }
00065 
00066     if ( shift < 0 || shift > rf->ns ) {
00067       bpm_error( "Sorry, but I've gone mad in generate_bpmsignal(...)",
00068                 __FILE__, __LINE__ );
00069       return BPM_FAILURE;
00070     }
00071 
00072     //printf("That means it's shifted by %i samples\n", shift);
00073 
00074     k = 0; // reset the sample counter
00075 
00076     // add the bunch produced waveform to the multibunch waveform
00077     // interpolating inside the waveform to get the timing right
00078     while ( shift+k <= rf->ns && k/rf->fs < mode->buffer->ns/mode->buffer->fs ) {
00079 
00080       rf->wf[shift+k] += doublewf_getvalue( mode->buffer,
00081                          (shift+k)/rf->fs - beam->bunch[j].arrival_time,
00082                          WF_QUADRATIC );
00083 
00084                          //WF_LANCZOS );
00085 
00086       k++;
00087 
00088     }  /* while ( shift + k <= rf->ns && k <= rf_bunch->ns ) */
00089 
00090     //printf("k = %i\n", k);
00091 
00092     //printf("*");
00093 
00094   } /* for ( j=0;j<beam->nbunches;j++ ) */
00095 
00096   //printf(" Done\n");
00097 
00098   //doublewf_delete( rf_bunch );
00099 
00100   //} /* for ( i=0; i<bpm->nmodes; i++ ) */ 
00101 
00102   return BPM_SUCCESS;
00103 }
